name: meek
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
quiet, gentle, and not willing to argue or express your opinions in a forceful way: She seemed so very meek and mild.

quiet and unwilling to disagree or fight or to strongly support personal ideas and opinions: He’s slight, meek, and balding, and hardly heroic. meekly adverb us
